title: Breaking News
info: Implemented local storage and API connected to the front end. Apply night mode and landscape mode.

title: SOS Notification
info: SOS notification app which will send notifications to nearby helpers in database from your location.

title: Message
info: Implemented real-time messaging service using Cloud Firestore. Hosted service using firebase

title: Writer Place
info: Developed an application enabling users to create, share, and delete articles, as well as like and follow other users' articles.

title: Fingerprint Voting System
info: Fingerprint based detection election. Manually you need to add fingerprint for dectection.

title: Search Engine of Image
info: This is a search engine for images with web annotaiton
